title: Golfpost Fantasy
description: A fantasy gaming web application developed using SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS, featuring modular components, live data integration via a RESTful API, and core functionalities such as Player and User dashboards, Player Picker, Tournament and League management tools, and user authentication.

title: My Personal Website.
description: A professional portfolio with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring a responsive design, blog, comprehensive portfolio, client testimonials, and services. User-centric with a dark theme, it's an effective platform for showcasing work and attracting clients.

title: BDesign Corporate Theme Template
description: Introducing my Next.js and TailwindCSS powered BDesign Corporate Website Template: A dynamic and visually appealing solution for businesses of all sizes. With customizable components and Responsive web views, this template empowers you to create a professional online presence effortlessly.

title: BShop E-Commerce Website Template
description: Introducing BShop Ecommerce Template – the ultimate solution for your online store. Built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Typescript, it offers a sleek design and seamless performance. Elevate your E-Commerce game effortlessly, with BShop – where style meets functionality for a standout online shopping experience.

title: Movie Database Management
description: Built with PHP and Postgresql, this user-friendly application features a personalized recommended movie section based on user preferences, along with comprehensive details about movies, cast, genres, and more. Explore movies with this intuitive interface tailored to enhance your movie- experience.

title: Facial Emotion Recognition
description: A Facial Emotion Recognition project, developed using Tensorflow and OpenCV with Python. This versatile application is trained using the FER2013 dataset and accurately identifies the 7 major emotions from the dataset. Working on its deployment as an API for seamless integration into various platforms and services.
